review: This is the perfect device for sending videos from my phone or computer to the television. If you are thinking about buying one do it. It is super handy and not gimmicky at all.
author: Nick Accuardi

review: I have no problem streaming to my wifi enabled DVD player that is connected to the same TV, but my Chromecast stutters and drops constantly. I have completely given up this garbage.
author: Christina Jones "Chrissy"

review: We all love this device. Can use on any tv in the home. Clear picture and sound. My mother in law loves it. Thinking of getting her one for Christmas.
author: Robert's real review

review: Works as directed.  We love watching Netflix and can cast it on any TV with this device attached.  Very easy setup.
author: Joseph P Clater

review: Amazing! I absolutely love this device. It's super easy to cast and I really like being able to use my phone or laptop to search for and start shows as opposed to the clunky Roku and SmartTV remotes that I have used at friends' houses.
author: NJH
